member.name: WS_CUSTOM_HTTP_PROXY
member.summary: A structure that is used to specify the custom proxy for the channel, using the .

summary.para: A semicolon-separated list of the proxy servers to be used by the channel. Each entry must follow the following EBNF.

member.name: WS_CUSTOM_HTTP_PROXY.bypass
member.summary: A semicolon separated list of servers which must be bypassed by the proxy. The bypass list can contain the string <local> to indicate that all local machine servers are bypassed.
